abstract: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt, who has been criticized for taking boys into sauna for naked chats, defiantly tells his supportive congregants at Riverdale Jewish Center that he intends to remain spiritual leader at synagogue; statement defies wishes of synagogue's board for him to step down over behavior that many find inappropriate.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt, who has been criticized for taking boys naked to the sauna, defied the board of his synagogue and told supportive congregants Wednesday that he would stay.

headline.main: Rabbi Who Had Naked Chats in Sauna Intends to Keep His Job at Riverdale Jewish Center
headline.print_headline: Rabbi Who Had Naked Chats in Sauna Intends to Keep His Job

snippet: Rabbi Jonathan Rosenblatt, who has been criticized for taking boys naked to the sauna, defied the board of his synagogue and told supportive congregants Wednesday that he would stay.
